sqlQuery.name: AllDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, display_name, description, summary, acknowledgement, nvl(display_category, category) as newcategory from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter

sqlQuery.name: Contacts
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, name as contact_name, affiliation from apidbTuning.DatasetContact

sqlQuery.name: Publications
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, pmid, citation from apidbTuning.DatasetPublication where pmid is not null
